sprite.name: Rotation Controlled Coin
sprite.notes: A standard coin that can be paired with rotation controllers. It does not have any additional features like [147] Coin.

dependency.notes: This coin does not function and cannot be collected unless actually paired to a rotation controller.

checkbox.title: Always Upright
checkbox.comment: When enabled, the coin will remain upright regardless of its rotation.
checkbox.comment2: This option will not work with 'Tilted Coin' enabled.

checkbox.title: Tilted Coin
checkbox.comment: When enabled, the bottom of the coin will always face the paired rotation controller.

list.title: Forced Rotation
list.comment: This determines the rotation that the coin will always be set to, regardless of it being rotated. This overrides the 'Always Upright' and 'Tilted Coin' options.

value.title: Rotation ID
value.comment: This pairs the Coin to a matching rotation controller.
